about_the_game:
We Survive Tonight is a 1-4 player action roguelite RPG in a post-apocalyptic world!



After just surviving the undead, you are left stranded outside the urban zones in the forest where it seemingly feels safe upon your arrival, just hours after the outbreak. You had great luck on surviving day 0, but the real deal starts there. Start from rags, alone and without any supplies to having your own weapon rack, military equipment and self sufficient "safe haven" with a lively community lead by you... That is, if the undead doesn't claim you first.

Deeply inspired by metroidvania and the survival horror game genre.
Loaded with mysteries and secrets for you to discover.

Features:


  • Time Matters: Overtime, the undead will grow stronger. It is up to you to decide what to do each day. Will you go out to scavenge for some supplies? Will stay and build new things? at daytime or night-time? up to you.

  • Procedurally Generated Raids: Procedurally generated urban areas, each time you raid a place for supplies, it will always be unique.

  • Multiplayer Together: Co-op together for a max party of 4 players! Battle, loot, create, quest and survive together with your friends!

  • Every Relationship Matters: While scavenging or exploring, you might find stranded survivors that could help you greatly, some willing to join
    your community if you help them back. But them joining is just the first step, develop rapport with them and they might share invaluable knowledge, exotic items and more.

  • Start from Scratch: Start from what the forest can offer to you, to having a lively community full of survivors that all share
    the same goal. From basic baseball bats and pistols to full fledged military equipment, but be careful, the undead around you evolves too.

  • Fight Fire with Fire: Scout, search and loot all different types of weapons and tools that will help your survival chances with the undead.
    From improvised blades, knives, hammers and firearms to carefully crafted katanas, fully modded firearms with suppressors, scopes and complex attachments.
    You will be able to equip body, legs, arms armor that might make a deadly infectious bite just a scratch, or you can wear cool glasses and a funny hat and call it a day.

  • The art of a Craft: Materials are not enough to craft everything. Explore the world and deepen your relationships with survivors to learn new recipes that will teach you to create new weaponry, explosives, consumables, crazy types of ammunition, armor types and unique cosmetics.

  • Deep Progression System: Everything you do will help your character become stronger depending on the proficiency, craft items to become better at it, use handguns to become better at them, with each milestone new perks become available.

content_descriptors.notes:
Cartoon gore and violence.
Suicide related scenarios are shown in certain parts of the game, and suicide topics are talked about on game dialogues with other NPCs.
Main target violence is only directed towards zombies.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.

short_description: Survival Horror Roguelite RPG with 1-4 co-op. Hours after the outbreak, you are left stranded in the forest that became your safe-haven. Battle through procedurally generated areas, manage your time wisely as each day passes, build your community and survive!
